A4.text: Chesil Beach (also known as Chesil Bank) in Dorset, England

A5.text: Chesil Beach is a 27‑kilometre (17 mi) long shingle barrier beach protecting The Fleet.

A6.text: Chesil Beach is a 27‑kilometre long shingle barrier beach on the Dorset coast.

A7.text: Dorset Museum is located in Dorset.
